Package com.polarion.platform.service.repository

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IExtendedFileChangesListener
    Extended IFileChangesListener.
    IExtendedRevisionMetaData
    Extends IRevisionMetaData with location change information from ILocationChangeMetaData.
    IFileChangesListener
    Listener used by IRepositoryService clients.
    ILocationChangeMetaData
    Meta data for location change.
    IRepositoryConnection
    Connection to some hierarchical file storage.
    IRepositoryInfo
    Represent the repository registry record
    IRepositoryReadOnlyConnection
    Conection to some hierarhical file storage.
    IRepositoryService
    Storage which stores arbitrary files in hierarchical (folders-files) structure.
    IResourceProperties
    System properties of given resource.
    IRevisionMetaData
    Meta data for one resource revision.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExtendedFileChangesListenerAdapter
    An abstract adapter class for receiving change revisiob events (and other events of file(folder) changing.
    FileChangesListenerAdapter
    An abstract adapter class for receiving file(folder) change events.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AccessDeniedException
    Raised when access is denied to some resource.
    NotConnectedException
    Exception indicating that called operation needs connection.
    RepositoryException
    Root of uniform Repository exception hierarchy.
    ResourceConflictException
    Exception raised when there was a conflict while resource was modified.
    ResourceException
    Raised when resource was not found.
    UnknownResourceException
    Raised when resource was not found.
